analytic.title: The Spirit of Life: Towards a Theology of the Holy Spirit in the Early Syriac Tradition

biblStruct.note: «When one turns into the early Syriac period in search of a theology of the Holy Spirit, the primary difficulty that is met with is the lack of any proper treatise on the Holy Spirit. What then are the early sources that are at our disposal? How did the early Syriac tradition live and express a very essential aspect of Christian Trinitarian faith, namely the faith in the Holy Spirit?» (P. 279)
